body:
This is for anyone who got there Xp rolled back.

How I fixed mine?

As far as I know just my nebula and Avicade Xp was rolled back. I just got one kill in nebula and that got all of my levels back. For Avicade, I was playing in the Mulvis map, and after I died (I think I got in 3rd place or something) I got all my lvls back!

So, to fix your Xp rollback (well, it worked for me at least)  you just have to gain Xp in that game then you get it all back!

Please give feedback if this worked for you or not!

title: SOMETHING REALLY HELPFUL

Its been fixed by now anyways xD
